content.question: Which of the following should the researchers in this study do out of a concern for ethical data collection?

choices.label: Only generalize these findings to people who have naturally good senses of smell.
Make sure the chemical does not affect the participants’ olfactory systems long-term.
Divide the participants into a control and an experimental group using random assignment.

content.answer: Make sure the chemical does not affect the participants’ olfactory systems long-term.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
